changelog.desc: When RolyBot is prompted too much in a short span of time, it triggers a message saying that he is going AFK, blocking additional requests for a short time. RolyBot can now request additional context from a static JSON file, context.json, about various things, like info about itself or RolyBug.

Improved cleaning pre-step and memory context handling. Bot now replies to others more naturally. When directly replying to the bot, the replied-to message (regardless of age) is appended to the prompt as extra context. Links are put within brackets to prevent embedding.
